segments.source_content: **2020 was great for Docusaurus**, despite [a regrettable start](https://docusaurus.io/blog/2020/01/07/tribute-to-endi) and a tumultuous year for everyone.

translations.zh-hant: **2020年對Docusaurus而言是豐收的一年**，儘管[年初發生了令人遺憾的事件](https://docusaurus.io/blog/2020/01/07/tribute-to-endi)，且對所有人來說這都是動盪的一年。

segments.source_content: We continued to invest in [Docusaurus 2](https://docusaurus.io/), and made it reach **full feature parity** with [Docusaurus 1](https://v1.docusaurus.io/).

translations.zh-hant: 我們持續投入[Docusaurus 2](https://docusaurus.io/)的開發，使其功能達到與[Docusaurus 1](https://v1.docusaurus.io/)的**完全對等**。

segments.source_content: We now **recommend Docusaurus 2** as the **default choice** to start a new Docusaurus project and encourage v1 users to [migrate to Docusaurus 2](https://docusaurus.io/docs/migration).

translations.zh-hant: 現在我們**推薦Docusaurus 2**作為新專案的**預設選擇**，並鼓勵v1用戶[遷移至Docusaurus 2](https://docusaurus.io/docs/migration)。

segments.source_content: We are **still in alpha**, but expect **some good news very soon**!

translations.zh-hant: 目前仍處於**alpha階段**，但預計**很快會有好消息公布**！

segments.source_content: ![Three Docusaurus plushies laid side-by-side on the table](/img/blog/2020-recap/docusaurus-plushie-banner.jpeg)

translations.zh-hant: ![三隻Docusaurus絨毛玩偶並排擺放在桌上](/img/blog/2020-recap/docusaurus-plushie-banner.jpeg)

segments.source_content: ## Docusaurus 2 highlights

translations.zh-hant: ## Docusaurus 2年度亮點

segments.source_content: We have worked on many features this year, and would like to highlight the most significant ones:

translations.zh-hant: 今年我們開發了多項功能，以下是其中最重要的幾項：

segments.source_content:
- **i18n**: easily translate your Docusaurus site, released soon! ([preview](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/3325), [doc](https://docusaurus.io/docs/next/i18n/introduction))
- **Version dropdown**: enable contextual version switch
- **Versioning options**: solving the most common pain-points users had with versioning
- **Contextual search**: search in the current version, use the brand-new DocSearch 3 experience
- **Markdown pages**: use Markdown instead of React components to create standalone pages
- **Better theme**: various UI, UX and accessibility improvements
- **PWA**: add offline support to your site, and make it installable
- **Fail-fast**: strict config validation, detect broken links, and prevent bad production deployments
- **Multi-instance**: use the docs plugin twice on a single site (e.g. iOS/Android SDK docs)
- **Migration CLI**: automate the upgrade from Docusaurus 1
- **CodeSandbox**: assess Docusaurus easily from your browser with [new.docusaurus.io](https://new.docusaurus.io/)
- **Canary releases**: use the `@canary` npm tag to use the upcoming release before anyone else
- **TypeScript**: progressive adoption for internal code, and improve usage for users
- **Publish Infima**: it is now [open-source](https://github.com/facebookincubator/infima)

translations.zh-hant:
- **國際化(i18n)**：輕鬆翻譯您的Docusaurus網站，即將發布！([預覽](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/3325), [文件](https://docusaurus.io/docs/next/i18n/introduction))
- **版本下拉選單**：實現情境式版本切換
- **版本控制選項**：解決用戶在版本控制方面最常見的痛點
- **情境式搜索**：在當前版本中搜索，使用全新的DocSearch 3體驗
- **Markdown頁面**：使用Markdown而非React組件來創建獨立頁面
- **更優質的主題**：多項UI、UX和無障礙功能改進
- **漸進式網頁應用(PWA)**：為網站添加離線支持，並可安裝到設備
- **快速失敗機制**：嚴格的配置驗證、檢測失效鏈接，防止不良生產環境部署
- **多實例支持**：在單一網站上使用兩次文檔插件（例如iOS/Android SDK文檔）
- **遷移CLI工具**：自動化從Docusaurus 1升級的流程
- **CodeSandbox整合**：通過[new.docusaurus.io](https://new.docusaurus.io/)直接在瀏覽器中評估Docusaurus
- **Canary版本**：使用`@canary` npm標籤搶先體驗即將發布的版本
- **TypeScript支持**：內部代碼逐步採用TypeScript，並改善用戶使用體驗
- **開源Infima**：現已[開放原始碼](https://github.com/facebookincubator/infima)

segments.source_content: ## Docusaurus 2 growth

translations.zh-hant: ## Docusaurus 2的成長

segments.source_content: The plan to [rebuild Docusaurus from scratch in 2019](https://docusaurus.io/blog/2019/12/30/docusaurus-2019-recap) paid off: after a slow start, Docusaurus 2 has been widely adopted and has **already outgrown Docusaurus 1** usage.

translations.zh-hant: 2019年[從頭重建Docusaurus的計劃](https://docusaurus.io/blog/2019/12/30/docusaurus-2019-recap)獲得了回報：經過緩慢起步後，Docusaurus 2已被廣泛採用，且**使用量已超越Docusaurus 1**。

segments.source_content: ![Docusaurus v1 vs. v2 npm trends of the year 2020. The installations of Docusaurus v2 is visibly up-growing, while v1 is slightly downward. V1 starts at 15000 and ends at 10000, while v2 starts at 2000 and ends at 25000. The intersection happens around June 2020.](/img/blog/2020-recap/docusaurus-npm-trends.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![2020年Docusaurus v1與v2的npm趨勢對比圖。v2的安裝量明顯上升，而v1則微幅下降。v1從15000開始降至10000，v2從2000攀升至25000。兩條曲線在2020年6月左右交叉](/img/blog/2020-recap/docusaurus-npm-trends.png)

segments.source_content: Notable **projects, startups, large companies, and individuals** adopted Docusaurus 2 ([showcase](https://docusaurus.io/showcase)):

translations.zh-hant: 值得注意的是，以下**專案、新創公司、大型企業和個人**已採用Docusaurus 2（[展示區](https://docusaurus.io/showcase)）：

- [Supabase](https://supabase.io)
- [React Navigation](https://reactnavigation.org)
- [React Redux](https://react-redux.js.org/)
- [Vector](https://vector.dev)
- [Algolia DocSearch](https://docsearch.algolia.com)
- [SAP Cloud SDK](https://sap.github.io/cloud-sdk)
- [Palo Alto Cortex XSOAR](https://xsoar.pan.dev)
- [Quddús George's website](https://portfoliosaurus.now.sh)

translations.zh-hant:

- [Palo Alto Cortex XSOAR](https://xsoar.pan.dev)
- [Quddús George的個人網站](https://portfoliosaurus.now.sh)

segments.source_content: We helped **large scale Docusaurus 1 sites to upgrade**, ensuring a proper **migration path** and **feature parity**.

translations.zh-hant: 我們協助**大型 Docusaurus 1 網站完成升級**，確保提供完善的**遷移路徑**與**功能對等性**。

segments.source_content: [React Native](https://reactnative.dev/) was successfully upgraded to Docusaurus 2 ([archived v1 site](http://archive.reactnative.dev/)):

translations.zh-hant: [React Native](https://reactnative.dev/) 已成功升級至 Docusaurus 2 ([v1 歸檔站點](http://archive.reactnative.dev/))：

segments.source_content: ![React Native's new website built with Docusaurus v2](/img/blog/2020-recap/react-native-screenshot.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![使用 Docusaurus v2 建構的 React Native 新官網](/img/blog/2020-recap/react-native-screenshot.png)

segments.source_content: Localized Docusaurus 1 sites (like **Jest**) will be able to upgrade too:

translations.zh-hant: 本地化的 Docusaurus 1 站點（如 **Jest**）也將能進行升級：

segments.source_content: ![Jest's new website built with Docusaurus v2 in Japanese](/img/blog/2020-recap/jest-screenshot.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![以日文呈現、使用 Docusaurus v2 建構的 Jest 新官網](/img/blog/2020-recap/jest-screenshot.png)

segments.source_content: We also saw the **[first right-to-left](https://datagit.ir/)** Docusaurus 2 site published:

translations.zh-hant: 我們也見證了**[首個從右至左](https://datagit.ir/)** 的 Docusaurus 2 站點上線：

segments.source_content: ![Datagit's website in Persian, a right-to-left language. The sidebar appears on the right of the window and the TOC appears on the left.](/img/blog/2020-recap/datagit-rtl-screenshot.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![波斯語（從右至左書寫語言）的 Datagit 網站。側邊欄位於視窗右側，目錄則顯示在左側。](/img/blog/2020-recap/datagit-rtl-screenshot.png)

segments.source_content: ## GitHub Activity

translations.zh-hant: ## GitHub 動態

segments.source_content:
- **Stars**: 14632 → 20946 (+43.2% y/y)
- **Total Contributors**: 303 → 512 (+68.9% y/y). Most of which are non-Facebook contributors
- **Weekly npm Downloads**: 2356 → 25592 (+986% y/y)
- **On GitHub**, Docusaurus 1 is used by 6311 projects (+62.9% y/y) while Docusaurus 2 is used by 5039 projects (+1940% y/y)

translations.zh-hant:
- **星標數**：14632 → 20946（年增 43.2%）
- **總貢獻者**：303 → 512（年增 68.9%），其中多數為非 Facebook 貢獻者
- **每週 npm 下載量**：2356 → 25592（年增 986%）
- **GitHub 上**，Docusaurus 1 被 6311 個專案使用（年增 62.9%），Docusaurus 2 則被 5039 個專案使用（年增 1940%）

segments.source_content: ## Collaboration with Major League Hacking

translations.zh-hant: ## 與 Major League Hacking 的合作

segments.source_content: We have welcomed [Major League Hacking](https://mlh.io/) (MLH) fellows for 2 seasons already.

translations.zh-hant: 我們已迎接 [Major League Hacking](https://mlh.io/)（MLH）學員參與了兩個賽季。

segments.source_content: We are very thankful for the **various contributions** they made, such as:

translations.zh-hant: 非常感謝他們帶來的**多項貢獻**，例如：

segments.source_content:
- Writing the foundations of the v1 to v2 migration CLI
- Help migrate the React Native website from v1 to v2
- Making the config validation more strict and exhaustive, returning helpful error messages
- Adding CodeSandbox support
- Improving the CI pipelines: build size and Lighthouse bots

translations.zh-hant:
- 編寫 v1 至 v2 遷移 CLI 的基礎架構
- 協助將 React Native 網站從 v1 遷移至 v2
- 強化配置驗證的嚴格性與完整性，回傳更有幫助的錯誤訊息
- 新增 CodeSandbox 支援功能
- 改進 CI 流程：建置檔案大小與 Lighthouse 機器人

segments.source_content: We look forward to continuing this collaboration in 2021.

translations.zh-hant: 我們期待在 2021 年持續這項合作。

segments.source_content: ## Community

translations.zh-hant: ## 社群

segments.source_content: The Docusaurus community continues to grow, the [Discord](https://discord.gg/docusaurus) server is quite active, and [Stack Overflow questions](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/docusaurus) keep being posted.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 社群持續成長，[Discord](https://discord.gg/docusaurus) 伺服器相當活躍，且 [Stack Overflow 上的提問](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/docusaurus)也不斷增加。

segments.source_content: The **modular architecture** of Docusaurus 2 allowed the community to build and publish [third-party plugins](https://docusaurus.io/community/resources#community-plugins-). As we would like to federate better our community, if you are building a plugin, please [let us know](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/discussions/4025).

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 2 的**模組化架構**讓社群能夠開發並發布[第三方外掛](https://docusaurus.io/community/resources#community-plugins-)。為了更好地整合社群資源，如果您正在開發外掛，請[告知我們](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/discussions/4025)。

segments.source_content: ## What's next?

translations.zh-hant: ## 下一步是什麼？

segments.source_content: As the **core features of Docusaurus 2** have finally been built, we will be able to dedicate more time to solve the pain points and bugs reported by the community, and make Docusaurus stable and convenient enough to enter the **beta and release-candidate phase**.

translations.zh-hant: 隨著 **Docusaurus 2 的核心功能**終於完成，我們將能夠投入更多時間解決社群回報的痛點和錯誤，讓 Docusaurus 足夠穩定與便利，進入**測試版和候選發布階段**。

segments.source_content: With proper support for **i18n and versioning**, and **large scale migrations** such as **React Native** and **Jest**, we now have a clear migration path for all Docusaurus 1 sites.

translations.zh-hant: 透過對**國際化與版本控制**的完善支援，以及**大規模遷移**如 **React Native** 和 **Jest**，我們現在為所有 Docusaurus 1 網站提供了清晰的遷移路徑。

segments.source_content: We still have a few **major features** that we would like to work on:

translations.zh-hant: 我們仍有幾項**主要功能**希望繼續推進：

segments.source_content:
- [Create a theme gallery](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/3522), make it easy to switch from one another, and include **first-class Tailwind support**
- [Upgrade to Webpack 5](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/4027), improve performances and build times
- [Better compatibility with CommonMark](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/3018), as MDX and makes it harder for CommonMark-based sites to adopt Docusaurus
- [Upgrade to MDX 2.0](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/4029)
- Other tasks that we might discover during 2021

translations.zh-hant:
- [建立主題畫廊](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/3522)，讓切換主題更輕鬆，並提供**一流的 Tailwind 支援**
- [升級至 Webpack 5](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/4027)，提升效能與建置速度
- [加強與 CommonMark 的相容性](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/3018)，因 MDX 使得基於 CommonMark 的網站較難採用 Docusaurus
- [升級至 MDX 2.0](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/4029)
- 其他可能在 2021 年發現的任務

segments.source_content: Huge thanks to the community for [their contributions in 2020](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/graphs/contributors?from=2020-01-01&to=2021-01-01&type=c), especially:

translations.zh-hant: 衷心感謝社群在 2020 年的[貢獻](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/graphs/contributors?from=2020-01-01&to=2021-01-01&type=c)，特別是：

- the Major League Hacking and Facebook interns for their significant impact

- the whole community for their contributions, and providing support to each other

- [Joel Marcey](https://github.com/JoelMarcey) 創建了 Docusaurus 並長期支持此專案
- 核心團隊成員 — [Alexey Pyltsyn](https://github.com/lex111)、[Sébastien Lorber](https://sebastienlorber.com)、[Yangshun Tay](https://x.com/yangshunz)

- [Bartosz Kaszubowski](https://github.com/Simek) 對 React Native 遷移的投入

segments.source_content: Cheers to a great 2021! 🎉

translations.zh-hant: 為美好的 2021 年乾杯！🎉
